objects.text:
• Authentic polarized lenses with iconic design
• 100% UV protection with dark tinted lenses
• Lightweight construction for all-day comfort

product_details.name: Classic Ray-Ban New Wayfarer - Timeless Style Meets Premium Protection
product_details.description:
• Authentic Ray-Ban polarized sunglasses with iconic design
• Classic black frame made from high-quality acetate material
• Dark tinted lenses offering 100% UV protection
• Signature Ray-Ban logo on lens and temple
• Durable and lightweight construction for all-day comfort
• Versatile wayfarer style suitable for all face shapes
• Impact-resistant lenses for enhanced durability
• Premium hinges for long-lasting performance
• Includes original Ray-Ban case and cleaning cloth
• Unisex design perfect for any occasion

banner_details:
The banner is a sleek and stylish product advertisement for sunglasses, divided into two distinct halves with a vertical central split. The left side features bold branding using the **heading** and **subheading** text elements, emphasizing the stylish product line. Below this, the **tagline** presents a subtle, italicized promotional message. The product highlights are concisely listed in bullet points via the **description** text. The **price** text is bold and prominently displayed in a futuristic font, attracting immediate attention. A vibrant **cta_button** rectangle accompanied by **cta_text** invites users to take action. On the right half, a **product_image** of the sunglasses is stylishly placed over abstract streaks and dot elements for added visual interest.

**Color Palette**:
- Charcoal Black: `#121212`
- Deep Gray: `#262626`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Pale Gold: `#F2CD5C`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray: `#EEEEEE`
- Medium Gray (divider): `#333333`
product_color: The product image features Ray-Ban sunglasses with a sleek, modern design anchored by a bold and timeless black color palette. The dominant color is a glossy jet black (#000000), used for the frame and temple arms, giving it a high-end, classic appeal. The lenses showcase a deep charcoal gray (#2E2E2E), adding contrast without overpowering the overall aesthetic. Subtle white accents (#FFFFFF) highlight the logo and metallic rivets, creating points of visual interest that add sophistication. The colors are smoothly blended through reflective gradients, enhancing realism and depth. Ideal banner palette: #000000, #2E2E2E, #FFFFFF, and a light silver-gray #B0B0B0 for contrast.
